public static function execute($controller,  
$arguments =  null)
Executes a controller method using reflection.
public static function flush()
Flushes previous write buffer and stores it’s data, that can later be rendered with render method.
public static function forward($controller,  
$arguments =  null)
Forwards to a controller method and terminates.
public static function get($key =  null)
Returns the specified session variable, if one is set.

Gets a view to be rendered or a value identified by a key.

Checks whether a session variable by this name is set.

Tells whether HTTP request is made with XMLHttpRequest
public static function isBot()
Tells whether HTTP request is made by a known bot or a search engine

Tells whether HTTP request method is GET
public static function isMobile()
Tells whether HTTP request is made with a mobile browser
public static function isPost()
Tells whether HTTP request method is POST
